system.attributeIncrease: Normal Strength if at least size 2. Beastly Strength if at least size 3. Improved Strength if at least size 4.
system.hpIncrease: Gain another hit die for every 1 additional size.

overview.base:
You convincingly physically disguise yourself to look like any similar species within 1 size of your own size.
Note: Any creature can attempt to Check Disguise to discover this.

You move on a distance up to your movement speed on the ground. If you have a fly speed or swim speed then you may move in the air or in water accordingly. This movement doesn't trigger reactive abilities.

system.trigger: You attack another creature.

overview.base: You become hidden. As you do this, you may roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk]]. If this is greater than your passive sneak ([[/roll 10 + @snk]]), then you use it as your hidden DC. If not, use your passive sneak.
overview.proficient: Instead roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk + @p]] for your hidden DC (if it's greater than your passive sneak).
overview.fluent: Instead roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk + @f]] for your hidden DC (if it's greater than your passive sneak).

system.requirements: You are in a location with shadows, dim light, three-quarters cover, or some other feature which the GM determines is appropriate for being hidden. You must remain in areas that maintain these conditions to stay hidden.

overview.base: You cannot use items in your hands.

results.hit: Target is snared.
results.critHit: The target automatically fails the first [[/roll 2d4]] roll.

system.endCondition: At the end of each of the target's turns, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.

overview.base: You crawl at half speed and can Move at half speed speed while hidden. Additionally, movement effects only require a DC 10 SNK feat save to keep from breaking your hiding.
overview.proficient: You crawl at full speed and can Move at full speed while hidden.

overview.base: You have Swimming and Diving but have no walk speed.
You swim at full speed.
You no longer have to stay on the surface of water while Swimming.
